content.prompt: A box of mass m hangs from massless strings, as shown in the figure above. The angle between strings 1 and 2 is 90o, and the angles that the strings make with the ceiling are Ѳ1 and Ѳ2, respectively. If T1 is the tension in string 1, which of the following are the magnitudes of the horizontal and vertical components of the tension in string 2 ?

choices.label:
Horizontal Component Vertical Component
T 1 cos θ 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E9C@ m g − T 1 sin θ 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@416C@

Horizontal Component Vertical Component
T 1 cos θ 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3E9C@ m g − T 1 cos θ 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4167@

Horizontal Component Vertical Component
T 1 sin θ 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EA1@ m g − T 1 sin θ 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@416C@

Horizontal Component Vertical Component
T 1 sin θ 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EA1@ m g − T 1 cos θ 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4167@

Horizontal Component Vertical Component
T 1 sin θ 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EA1@ m g + T 1 sin θ 1 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4161@

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
